name: Recurring Maintenance Windows
description: Create recurring maintenance windows within PagerDuty

REQUESTER_EMAIL.description: Email address for the PagerDuty user you would like to label as the requester for creating these maintenance windows

INTERVAL.description: Interval between maintenance windows in seconds

DURATION.description: Duration of maintenance windows in seconds

START_TIME.description: Starting date/time to create the first maintenance window in ISO 8601 format

SERVICES.description: A comma separated list of PagerDuty services you would like to schedule for recurring maintenance windows

DESCRIPTION.description: A description to be included on each maintenance window

ACCESS_TOKEN.description: A valid PagerDuty v2 API access token
